alert.note: Alert for Eastern Fall River; Southern Foothills; Western Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 22 at 1:41AM MST until November 24 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH FRIDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible, highest amounts generally in the Edgemont area and points to the south and west. * WHERE...The Southern Foot Hills, the Western Fall River County Plains and the Eastern Fall River County Plains. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon through Friday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means heavy snow, strong winds, freezing precipitation, and cold temperatures are possible. Monitor NOAA weather radio, local radio or television, or the Internet for updates on this potentially dangerous storm. Take time to prepare for severe winter conditions before the storm develops.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Fall River; Southern Foothills; Western Fall River
